title: $:/litClock/times/-08:43-John Grisham
quote_first: “You understand this tape recorder is on?” “Uh huh” “And it’s Wednesday, May 15, at
quote_last: in the mornin'.” “If you say so"

title: $:/litClock/times/-08:43-Mark Haddon
quoteSourceTitle: The Curious Incident Of The Dog In The Night-Time
